properties.description: Create DB, master key and scoped credentials.

content.query:
-- Create a DB - run this statment first
CREATE DATABASE factories
-- Create Master Key (if not already created) 
-- Note: change to the created DB scope
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Password.123!';
-- Create credentials
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [factories_cred]
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
SECRET = '?sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2022-09-30T14:42:02Z&st=2022-07-10T06:42:02Z&spr=https&sig=s6ACHnNjC7USgitOTDMQZ7sg%2F8c6Q4wEUKO1RvSSyCY%3D'
